---
title: "缺失率_月份_污染物_热图"
output: html_document
---

```{r fig=TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, cache = F, fig.height = 5, fig.width = 8, fig.align='center', fig.pos="H"}
# 加载包
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
# 加载数据
load(file = "../1.样本数据/1731国控站点污染物数据.RData")
# 定义污染物因子顺序
pollutants_sorted <- c("PM2.5", "PM10", "SO2", "NO2", "O3", "CO", "AVG")
# 处理数据
pollutants_data %>%
  # 按月份分组
  group_by(month) %>%
  # 计算各月份缺失率均值
  summarise(
  # 计算PM2.5
    PM2.5 = mean(missing_pm2_5, na.rm = T),
  # 计算PM10
    PM10 = mean(missing_pm10, na.rm = T),
  # 计算SO2
    SO2 = mean(missing_so2, na.rm = T),
  # 计算NO2
    NO2 = mean(missing_no2, na.rm = T),
  # 计算O3
    O3 = mean(missing_o3, na.rm = T),
  # 计算CO
    CO = mean(missing_co, na.rm = T),
  # 计算AVG
    AVG = mean(missing, na.rm = T)
  ) %>%
  # 转换为热图需要的宽表
  gather(key = pollutant, value = missing, -month) %>%
  # 将污染物转化为因子型
  mutate(pollutant = factor(pollutant, levels = pollutants_sorted)) %>%
  # 画图
  ggplot(aes(x = factor(month), y = pollutant)) +
  # 热图
  geom_tile(aes(fill = missing * 100)) +
  # 文字
  geom_text(aes(label = sprintf("%1.2f", missing * 100)),
            vjust = 1, col = "black") +
  # 限制坐标轴范围
  scale_x_discrete(expand = c(0, 0)) +
  scale_y_discrete(expand = c(0, 0)) +
  # 调整颜色
  scale_fill_gradient2(
    name = "缺失率(%)", low = "darkgreen",
    mid = "yellow", high = "red3",
    midpoint = 5.5
  ) +
  # 修改坐标轴标题
  labs(x = "月份", y = "污染物") +
  # 修改字体及背景
  theme(
    axis.text = element_text(face = "bold", size = 10, family = "STXihei"),
    axis.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 12, family = "STXihei"),
    legend.title = element_text(family = "STXihei"),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "transparent"),
    panel.border = element_rect(
      fill = "transparent",
      color = "transparent"
    ),
    axis.line = element_line(color = "black")
  )
```

解读：6种污染物的全国平均缺失率情况呈现相似的季节特征，8月份和9月份缺失率较高，2月份和3月份缺失率较低。
